title: Coming Up on 'This Week' Exclusive: Pastor Rick Warren

content: Update: On ABC’s “This Week,” Rick Warren, the pastor and author of “The Purpose-Driven Life,” was scheduled to address seemingly contradictory statements he has made about whether he supported Proposition 8, a measure that banned gay marriage in California. Just moments before interview, however, Mr. Warren canceled, citing exhaustion. The New York Times
reply: Update: On ABC’s “This Week,” Rick Warren, the pastor and author of “The Purpose-Driven Life,” was scheduled to address seemingly contradictory statements he has made about whether he supported Proposition 8, a measure that banned gay marriage in California. Just moments before interview, however, Mr. Warren canceled, citing exhaustion. The New York Times
title: Coming Up on 'This Week' Exclusive: Pastor Rick Warren

content: Exhausted? Didn't Moses get someone to help hold up his hands ..or was it Joshuah? Anyway.... Easter must be hard those mega church mall type preachers. Thanks for letting us know... I really didn't miss anything, then!
